src:
Fadilah Nur Rahman Gantikan Fadhil di Timnas U-19 Indonesia
05 Nov 2019, 11:36 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Timnas U-19 Indonesia mengganti bek Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya dengan Fadilah Nur Rahman. Pergantian dilakukan menjelang laga perdana kontra Timor Leste pada Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 yang akan berlangsung Rabu, 6 November 2019.
“Fadhil cedera dalam latihan terakhir. Kami terpaksa menggantinya dengan pemain dari Diklat Ragunan, Fadilah Nur Rahman,” ujar pelatih timnas U-19 Fakhri Husaini dalam konferensi pers sebelum pertandingan di Jakarta, Selasa.
Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah sendiri adalah pemain jebolan PPLP Jakarta yang sebelumnya sudah memperkuat timnas U-18 di Piala AFF U-18 yang berlangsung di Vietnam.
Sementara penggantinya Fadilah Nur Rahman merupakan bagian dari skuad Fakhri Husaini ketika menjuarai Piala AFF U-16 tahun 2018 dan menjadi perempat finalis Piala Asia U-16 2018.
Meski melakukan perubahan komposisi skuad secara mendadak, Fakhri menegaskan timnya tidak terganggu dengan hal itu.
Semua pemain dalam kondisi siap tempur menjalani Kualifikasi Piala Asia U-19. “Semua pemain siap dan sangat termotivasi. Mereka sangat antusias menyambut laga pertama besok,” kata Fakhri.
Pertandingan Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 Indonesia versus Timor Leste berlangsung mulai pukul 19.00 WIB di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Rabu (6 November). Sebelum laga tersebut, mulai pukul 15.30 WIB digelar laga Korea Utara melawan Hong Kong di tempat yang sama.
text:
Fadilah Nur Rahman Replaces Fadhil in Indonesia's U-19 national team
05 Nov 2019, 11:36 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 national team replaces defender Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya with Fadilah Nur Rahman. Substitution will take place ahead of the inaugural match against Timor Leste in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Group K which will take place Wednesday, 6 November 2019.
"Fadhil was injured in the last practice. We were forced to replace it with a player from Ragunan Education and Training, Fadilah Nur Rahman, "U-19 national team coach Fakhri Husaini told a press conference before the match in Jakarta on Tuesday.
Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah himself is a PPLP Jakarta dropout player who previously had strengthened the U-18 national team at the U-18 AFF Cup which took place in Vietnam.
While his successor Fadilah Nur Rahman was part of Fakhri Husaini's squad when he won the AFF U-16 Cup in 2018 and became quarter-finalist of the 2018 U-16 Asian Cup.
Despite the sudden change in the composition of the squad, Fakhri insisted his team was not bothered by it.
All players in combat condition undergo the U-19 Asian Cup Qualifiers. "All players are ready and very motivated. They are very enthusiastic about welcoming the first fight tomorrow, "said Fakhri.
The K-AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Group K match between Indonesia and Timor Leste takes place starting at 19.00 WIB at the Bung Karno Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Wednesday (November 6). Before the match, starting at 3:30 pm West Sumatra match was held against Hong Kong in the same place.
